state

Class GameState.Hotbar

  • java.lang.Object
    • component.Component
      • state.GameState.Hotbar
  • Enclosing class:
    GameState

    private class GameState.Hotbar
extends Component
    A class for the hotbar which stores Items that the user can place. It is displayed at the bottom of the screen and will later interact with the inventory
    Author:
    Spencer Yoder

    • Nested Class Summary

      Indicates which slot of the Hotbar is selected

    • Method Detail

      • addItem

        public void addItem(Item item)
        Adds the given Item to the Hotbar. If the item already has a slot in the Hotbar, that slot gets incremented, otherwise, the item is placed in the first empty slot from the left
        Parameters:
        item - the given Item

      • changeSelection

        public void changeSelection(int i)
        Increment the selection by the given amount
        Parameters:
        i - the given amount
